Message.Title: Great News, Surface Pros are sellign at 1.5 million unites a quater
Message.Msg: Bloomberg reported from 3 different sourses. True, everyone hoped the sales is higher. But, since the devices were just out from 1 to 3 months ago, this 1.5 million units sold are acturally pretty good. Especially for the Surface Pros, 400,000 units have been sold, since the Pros were launched about a month ago. This puts the Pros at about 1.5 millions for a quater. Since they sell for about $1 k a piece, this is about $1.5 billonsof fresh revenue. Add in the Surface RT, this is acturally way, way better than the street feared. Surface Pros are basically sellign at 1.5 million untes a quater!!!! Start from June, INTC shoudl start to have the Haswall chips ready. I am expecting MSFt to release Surface Pro 2 pretty soon. With Haswall chips, MSFT Should be able to make smaller , lighter , cooler and cheaper Surface Pros!!!!!
